recipesJson.name: Shamrock Shake
recipesJson.author: cloudstate
recipesJson.description: Simple Shamrock Shake from Mcdonald's. For all those times when you want a Shamrock shake but they are only here for 2 months out of the year. Give this thing a good 3-5 days for all of the Creams to work their magic and the mint to fall into the background like a true shamrock shake. If you like your Shamrock Shake extra minty bump the Creme De Menthe to 3%. The Butter Cream is what sets this Shamrock Shake apart from other recipes of the same. It adds that buttery cream that is perfect for this profile.

reviews.text: It's so good! I added 0.50 of ws23 to make it cold like a shake and definitely went to 3 for the creme de menthe..such a perfect recipe thanks!!!
Exactly as described. Perfect shamrock shake.
Butter Cream really sets this off, making it a super rich and delicious, spot-on Shamrock Shake recipe.  Awesome.  You really don't need to like mint to appreciate this one.
